title: zakservers
author: zakservers
content: Zak Servers is pleased to announce our new series of unmetered offshore streaming servers, with full-duplex 1gbps to 20gbps connections.Full-duplex means that you can use the full port speed for both download and upload, you can use these servers for any downloading websites, or web streaming applications or any other application that needs intensive traffic performance.These offshore streaming servers are available in our offshore Ukraine and Bulgaria locations.BTC is accepted as a payment option.To order kindly visit: https://zakservers.com/offshore-dedicated-servers.phpOr contact with our sales department via live chat or support ticket, our support team works 24/7365.
